summary: A young cowboy, Johnny, playing in a rigged poker game is forced to shoot one of the other players. The cowboy takes quick leave as he is accused of murder and a reward for his capture is posted.
cast: Ivan Rassimov|Giovanni Cianfriglia|Isabella Savona|Franco Cobianchi|Tom Felleghy|Cristina Penz|Aldo Cecconi|Enzo Consoli|Renato Mambor|Adriano Micantoni|Valentino Macchi|Franco Cecconi|Riccardo Garrone|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|John Bartha|Consalvo Dell'Arti|Franco Gulà|Mimmo Poli|Franco Ukmar|Raffaele Di Mario|Amedeo Timpani
keywords: italo western|street shootout|punctuation in title|ellipsis in title|spaghetti western
director: Director: Sergio Garrone (as Willy S. Regan)
title: Django: Si quieres vivir, dispara
